findings.title: A01.Missing Sanity Check When Adding Cross Shard Receipts
findings.description: There is a vulnerability in the P2P module, which could be exploited by attackers to slow down the processing of cross shard transfers.

findings.title: A02.Missing Penalty When Leaders Not Processing Cross Shard Receipts
findings.description: There is no penalty if shard leader intentionally ignore any specific receipts and let them stay pending forever.
